hadith.text: It was narrated that Abu Hurairah, may Allah be pleased with him, that:The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: "When the Imam says: Not (the way) of those who earned Your anger, nor of those who went astray, say: 'Amin,' for if a person's Amin coincides with the Amin of the angels, his previous sins will be forgiven
